name: Killer Hockey Mask Part V
description: This is a replica of the mask worn in Friday The 13th part 5. This is a resign mask hand painted to the highest quality.

name: Chainsaw Dead Skin Mask
description:
This mask is a prop replica from TCM 2. Made of super thick high-quality latex. As well as hand painted and airbrushed. 


DISCLAIMER: CRIMSON MASK STUDIOS reserves the right to alter the price, change, or discontinue any product without prior notice. All products are guaranteed to be of the highest quality, though some differences are to be expected due to their hand-crafted nature. If you are dissatisfied for any reason, please contact Collin X within 7 days of receiving your order so he can discuss available options for meeting your satisfaction. Returned orders will result in either a replacement of the same item or credit towards another order. There are no refunds. Please allow 2-4 weeks for delivery. Orders are filled in the order they are received and delivery time may vary. Rush orders are possible but additional charges will apply. Contact Collin X for more details.

name: Hockey Manhattan Variant Mask
description:
This one of a kind mask prop is replicated from the poster of Jason Takes Manhattan. This prop mask comes with no straps due to it not having any on the poster. If you want straps please email me and we can put them on for an additional 5$. Crimsonmaskstudios@gmail.com

name: Mummy Mask
description:
This mask is our first release. Sculpted and hand-painted by Collin X  on our own batch of ghoulish teal. These masks are hand-numbered and limited to a run of 50. Get them while you can!

Custom paint jobs can be made upon request. Email crimsonmaskstudios@gmail.com for pricing info.
